name: Solo Hunt
description:
Welcome to Solo Hunt, the ultimate action rogue-like game! Fight with fearsome monsters in procedural generated worlds.
The further you fight, you'll encounter a variety of challenges and opportunities. Will you fight your way through hordes of goblins, undeads or golems? Your desire to win will determine your fate in this perilous fantasy realm.

Upgrade your weapons and armor to destroy your foes. But beware – the world is filled with danger at every turn, and even the mightiest warrior can fall in the face of overwhelming odds.

Do you have what it takes to conquer the worlds and claim the ultimate prize? Only the bravest and most skilled adventurers will succeed in Solo Hunt
